<Text: Live at Jittery Joe's is an album released in 2001 by Jeff Mangum of Neutral Milk Hotel to battle the high prices of bootlegs on eBay.>

Text: Live at Jittery Joe's:  Jeff had not prepared a set list, so some of the songs were chosen by the audience.
